items.headline: Here’s what Elon Musk must do to become a Tesla trillionaire
items.summary_en: Tesla proposes a $1 trillion pay package for Elon Musk, if can stay focused on adding $7.5 trillion to the company’s value.

items.headline: U.S. unemployment rate jumps to nearly 4-year high. Weak 22,000 increase in August jobs report tees up Fed rate cut.
items.summary_en: The economy added a lackluster 22,000 new jobs in August and the unemployment rate rose to a nearly four-year high, underscoring the increasing fragility of the U.S. labor market.
